data.name: Arizona Sunshine®
data.description:
*Includes the new Trailer Park horde map & all earlier free Horde updates*

VR meets the zombie apocalypse! Arizona Sunshine® is the original zombie shooter rebuilt entirely for Oculus Quest. Powered by 360° gameplay freedom, the untethered Arizona Sunshine® experience immerses you and up to 3 fellow survivors in a world overrun by zombies more than ever. 

When you hear a flash of a human voice on the radio, your hopes surge - there are survivors out in the blistering heat of the post-apocalyptic Grand Canyon state! Armed with little more than your motion-controlled weapons and the scarce ammo and consumables you find along the way, you need to navigate hordes of zombies in your desperate search for survivors.

• Co-op multiplayer: Join forces with a friend in campaign mode or Horde mode for up to 4 Oculus Quest players
• Handle 25+ weapons with real-life movements
• Complete a full campaign, solo or in co-op
• Freely explore huge environments including deserts, canyons & mines

translations.long_description:
Зомби-апокалипсис в виртуальной реальности! В своих попытках найти людей вы должны пробиться сквозь орды зомби, охотящихся за вашим мозгом, с помощью оружия, скудного боезапаса и расходных материалов, которые встретятся на вашем пути.
 
• Реалистичное обращение с оружием: С помощью контроллеров движения Touch воспользуйтесь арсеналом разнообразного оружия, выполняя реалистичные движения
• Полномасштабная кампания: Игра выстроена из небольших фрагментов виртуальной реальности, вместе составляющих цельное повествование 
• Совместная многопользовательская игра: Объединяйте усилия с друзьями в совместной кампании или многопользовательском режиме "Орда"
translations.short_description: Разработанная исключительно для виртуальной реальности, игра "Солнечная Аризона" погружает вас в самый эпицентр зомби-апокалипсиса. Реалистичные движения при обращении с оружием, открытый для исследования постапокалиптический мир, возможность испытать свои навыки выживания в виртуальной реальности - упокоение неупокоенных еще никогда не было таким захватывающим приключением!

translations.long_description:
가상 현실로 좀비 재앙을 경험한다! 아리조나 선샤인은 VR 플레이를 위해 제작된 FPS로, 좀비로 어지럽혀진 재앙 이후 미국 남서부를 경험하실 수 있습니다.

라디오에서 인간의 목소리가 들릴 때, 실날같은 희망이 생깁니다. 재앙 이후 그랜드 캐년의 끔찍한 열기에서도 살아남은 생존자가 있습니다! 모션 컨트롤 무기와 탄약과 소모품으로 급하게 무장한 상태에서, 인간 자취를 찾아 당신의 뇌를 향해 오는 좀비 떼를 찾으십시오.

• 실제 무기 다루기: VR 모션 컨트롤러를 사용하여, 실전처럼 25개 이상의 무기를 다뤄보세요. 공격을 예상하고, 탄약을 관리하며, 적을 조각내기 위해 시야에 두고 조준하세요.
• 풀 사이즈 캠페인: 전체 내러티브를 구성하는 VR 단위로 제작되었습니다. 세션을 위해 뛰어들거나 완벽한 주행을 위해 머무를 수 있습니다.
• 자유로운 탐험: 위험한 캐년과 깊고 어두운 광산과 같은 곳을 탐험하기 위해 자유롭게 돌아다녀 보세요.
• 협동 멀티 플레이어: 협동 캠페인 또는 멀티 플레이어 호드 모드에서 힘을 합쳐 싸우세요.
translations.short_description: 오직 VR 플레이를 위해 만든 애리조나 선샤인으로 좀비 재앙을 경험해보세요. 실전처럼 무기로 싸우고, 재앙 이후의 세계를 자유롭게 탐험하면서 VR에서 당신의 생존 본능을 실험해보세요. 좀비를 해치우면서 그 어느 때보다 스릴을 느끼실 겁니다.

translations.long_description:
Le monde de la VR rencontre l’univers de l’apocalypse zombie ! Arizona Sunshine est un FPS qui prend place dans une région du sud-ouest de l’Amérique frappée par une invasion de zombies.

Armé simplement de vos armes contrôlées par vos mouvements et de quelques munitions et ressources trouvées en chemin, vous devez abattre des hordes de zombies déterminés à vous dévorer le cerveau, tandis que vous tentez d’entrer en contact avec d’autres humains.

• Maniez vos armes avec vos propres mouvements : maniez un large éventail d'armes
• Campagne intégrale : découpée en épisodes qui forment une histoire complète, jouez lors de sessions courtes ou toute la campagne
• Exploration libre : déplacez-vous en toute liberté, entre autres dans de canyons et des mines
• Mode multi-joueur coopératif : associez vos forces à celle d’un ami en mode coopération ou en mode Horde multi-joueurs
translations.short_description: Conçu exclusivement pour la VR, Arizona Sunshine vous plonge en plein cœur d’une apocalypse zombie. Maniez des armes de manière réaliste, explorez un monde post-apocalyptique en liberté et testez vos techniques de survie en VR - la lutte contre les morts-vivants n’a jamais été aussi palpitante.

translations.long_description:
Virtuelle Realität trifft auf Zombie-Apokalypse. Arizona Sunshine ist der erste exklusiv für VR entwickelte FPS, der dich in den von Zombies überrannten postapokalyptischen Südwesten Amerikas eintauchen lässt.

Wenn du Fetzen einer menschlichen Stimme im Radio hörst, erwacht Hoffnung – es gib Überlebende in der flirrenden Hitze des postapokalyptischen Grand Canyon-Staates! Bewaffnet mit kaum mehr als deinen bewegungsgesteuerten Waffen und wenig Munition sowie Ausrüstung machst du dich alleine auf den Weg

• Echter Waffeneinsatz: Nutze die bewegungssteuerungen, um mithilfe von Bewegungen in Echtzeit eine große Auswahl verschiedenster Waffen zu bedienen
• Komplette Kampagne
• Koop-Multiplayer: Schließe dich im Koop-Kampagnen-Modus mit Freunden zusammen oder spiele mit bis zu vier Spielern im Multiplayer-Hordenmodus
translations.short_description: Entwickelt für VR bringt dich Arizona Sunshine mittenrein in eine Zombie-Apokalypse. Steuere deine Waffen mit Bewegungen in Echtzeit, erkunde eine postapokalyptische Welt und teste deine Überlebensfähigkeiten in VR – bette die Untoten zurück zur ewigen Ruhe, mit mehr Spannung als jemals zuvor.

translations.long_description:
VR meets the zombie apocalypse! Arizona Sunshine is a shooter built exclusively for VR that immerses you in a southwestern America overrun by zombies. 

When you hear a flash of a human voice on the radio, your hopes surge - there are survivors out in the blistering heat of the post-apocalyptic Grand Canyon state! Armed with your motion-controlled weapons and the scarce ammo and consumables you find along the way, you need to navigate hordes of zombies coming for your brain in your desperate search for human contact.

• Handle, fire, and reload over 25 different weapons with real-life movements
• Explore huge environments including deserts, canyons, and mines
• Full-size campaign
• Co-op multiplayer: Join a friend in campaign mode or Horde mode (up to 4 players)
translations.short_description: Built exclusively for VR, Arizona Sunshine puts you in the midst of a zombie apocalypse. Handle weapons with real-life movements, freely explore a post-apocalyptic world, and put your survival skills to the test in VR - putting the undead back to rest is more thrilling than ever before.

translations.long_description:
Virtual reality en de zombie apocalyps komen samen! Arizona Sunshine is een FPS exclusief ontworpen voor VR die je onderdompelt in een met zombies overlopen Zuidwest-Amerika.

Wanneer je met je radio een glimp van een menselijke stem opvangt, welt je hoop op – er zijn andere overlevenden in de post-apocalyptische Grand Canyonstaat! Gewapend met de schaarse wapens en ammunitie die je onderweg vindt, neem je het op tegen hordes zombies in een wanhopige zoektocht naar menselijk contact.
 
• Hanteer wapens met echte bewegingen: Met Touch controllers gebruik je diverse wapens met echte bewegingen
• Volledige campagne
• Vrije verkenning: Beweeg vrij rond of teleporteer om uiteenlopende omgevingen zoals verraderlijke canyons en duistere mijnen te verkennen
• Co-op multiplayer: Sla de handen ineen in de co-op campagne of multiplayer Horde-modus
translations.short_description: Waan je in een zombie apocalyps met Arizona Sunshine, exclusief ontwikkeld voor VR. Trek je wapen, richt en schiet met echte bewegingen, verken een post-apocalyptische wereld met volledige vrijheid, en test je overlevingsvaardigheden in VR – de strijd tegen de ondoden was nog nooit zo intens.

translations.long_description:
虚拟现实遇上僵尸横行的末日世界！亚利桑那阳光（Arizona Sunshine）是专为虚拟现实（VR）打造的第一人称射击类（FPS）游戏，可带你沉浸于末日之后美国西南部地区僵尸横行的世界。

当你听到收音机中传来人声时，你的心中将涌起无限希望——在末日之后骄阳似火的大峡谷州，还有其他幸存者！你凭着仅有的几件动作控制类武器以及沿途搜寻到的稀缺武器和补给，突破一波又一波为吃你脑子而来的僵尸群的重重围困，找寻其他幸存者。

• 通过现实动作操控武器：使用VR动作控制器可以通过现实动作操控超过25种武器。玩家能够预计攻击、管理武器以及用准镜瞄准，将不死敌人炸成碎片。
• 情节完整的战役：内置VR块连在一起将构成一段完整的故事——你可以跳到某个短小的战斗情景，也可以按顺序完成所有战斗。
• 自由探索：可以自由移动来探索危机四伏的峡谷和深不见底黑暗矿场
• 多人联合作战：可以使用联合作战或僵尸暴动多人模式协同战斗
translations.short_description: 亚利桑那阳光 (Arizona Sunshine) 是一款专为虚拟现实（VR）打造的游戏，将让你置身于僵尸横行的末日世界。在VR中，你可以通过现实中的动作操控武器，自由探索末日之后的世界，接受生存技能考验——击杀不死僵尸的刺激程度前所未有!

translations.long_description:
La realtà virtuale incontra l’apocalisse zombie! Arizona Sunshine è un FPS che ti immerge nelle lande post apocalittiche del sud-ovest americano, nel pieno di un’invasione zombie.

Tuttavia, quando riesci a udire una voce umana attraverso una radio, la speranza torna a ridestarsi! Forse ci sono ancora dei superstiti che sfidano le atroci temperature del Grand Canyon! Usa le tue armi controllate con il movimento e le scarse risorse recuperate per avanzare tra orde di zombie che bramano il tuo cervello, alla disperata ricerca di un contatto umano.

• Gestione delle armi realistica: Usa i controller di Touch per gestire una varietà di armi con movimenti reali.
• Campagna estesa: La campagna è formata da sezioni VR che compongono un percorso narrativo. Affronta il gioco in brevi sessioni o tutto d’un fiato.
• Esplorazione libera: Esplora liberamente pericolosi canyon, oscure miniere e altri scenari.
translations.short_description: Progettato esclusivamente per VR, Arizona Sunshine ti abbandona nel mezzo dell’apocalisse zombie. Gestisci le armi con movimenti reali, esplora un mondo post apocalittico e metti alla prova le tue capacità di sopravvivenza con la RV: ridurre a brandelli i non morti non è mai stato così coinvolgente.

translations.long_description:
¡El apocalipsis zombi llega a la realidad virtual! Arizona Sunshine es un FPS diseñado solo para VR que te sumerge en un suroeste americano post-apocalíptico infestado de zombis.

Cuando oyes una voz humana en la radio, tu esperanza renace... ¡hay supervivientes ahí fuera en el calor del post-apocalíptico estado del Gran Cañón! Armado con tus armas controladas por movimiento y los escasos consumibles y munición que hallarás, sortea las hordas de zombis en tu búsqueda desesperada de otros humanos.

• Manejo realista de armas: Con los controladores Touch, maneja una amplia gama de armas con movimientos realistas
• Campaña a tamaño completo
• Exploración libre: Muévete libremente para explorar cañones traicioneros, profundas y oscuras minas y mucho más
• Multijugador cooperativo: Une fuerzas en una campaña cooperativa o en modo Horda multijugador
translations.short_description: Desarrollado para la RV, Arizona Sunshine te sitúa en medio de un apocalipsis zombi. Maneja armas con movimientos realistas, explora un mundo post-apocalíptico y pon a prueba tus habilidades de supervivencia en la RV - devolver a su descanso a los no muertos nunca ha sido tan emocionante.

translations.display_name: アリゾナサンシャイン (Arizona Sunshine)
translations.long_description:
バーチャル・リアリティとゾンビが溢れるアポカリプスが一つになりました！バーチャル・リアリティのためだけに作られたFPS、アリゾナ・サンシャインで、プレイヤーは人類滅亡後のゾンビが溢れるアメリカ南西部に入り込みます。

ラジオから人の声を漏れ聞いたとき、希望が沸き起こります。人類滅亡後のグランドキャニオンの灼熱の中、生存者がいる！モーションコントロールできる武器、そして道のりを進む中で見つけるわずかな弾薬や消耗品を武器にして、プレイヤーは人間の脳みそを求めてやってくるゾンビの群れの中、他の生存者を探す旅を続けます。

• 実際に体を動かして武器を操作：バーチャル・リアリティのモーションコントローラを使って、25種類以上の武器を実際に体を動かして扱います。攻撃を予測し、弾薬を使いこなし、狙いを定めて爆破させ、アンデッドをバラバラにしましょう。
• フルサイズのキャンペーン：バーチャル・リアリティのセッションで構成され、全体が完全なストーリーとなるキャンペーンは、短時間でも、ストーリー全体をプレイすることもできます。
• 自由な探索：危険な峡谷や暗く深い鉱山など、世界を自由に探索しましょう。
• 協力マルチプレーヤー：協力キャンペーンやマルチプレイヤーのホードモードで、友達と力を合わせて戦いましょう。
translations.short_description: バーチャル・リアリティ専用のアリゾナ・サンシャインで、プレイヤーはゾンビが溢れるアポカリプスのただ中に入り込みます。実際に体を動かして武器を扱い、人類滅亡後の世界を自由に探索し、バーチャル・リアリティで自分のサバイバルスキルを試しましょう。アンデッドを倒していく体験は、これまでになくスリリングです。

changelog.change_log:
Features:
- New hordemode: Trailer Park map

Features/Improvements (Quest 2 specific)
- HD Zombies
- Zombies fall in ragdoll on death
- More mutilation variants on zombies
- Muzzle flash dynamic light
- Background zombies
- Destructable car windows
- Shader improvements
	- Added Normal/Specular
	- Extra zombie variations
	- Environment details
- More level decorations
	- Blood spots
	- Grass/Bushes/tall grass
	- Environmental particles
	- Birds

Features/Improvements (Quest 1 and 2) 
- Improved texture resolutions
- Improved lightmap resolutions
- Tweaked intensity of colors (Canyons too red, flora too green)
- Cybershoes support

Fixes
- Fixed level 04_Caves white background glitch
- Fixed Quest 2 users being kicked out of multiplayer lobbies

Features/Improvements (Quest 2 specific)
- HD Zombies
- Zombies fall in ragdoll on death
- More mutilation variants on zombies
- Muzzle flash dynamic light
- Background zombies
- Destructable car windows
- Shader improvements
	- Added Normal/Specular
	- Extra zombie variations
	- Environment details
- More level decorations
	- Blood spots
	- Grass/Bushes/tall grass
	- Environmental particles
	- Birds

Features/Improvements (Quest 1 and 2) 
- Improved texture resolutions
- Improved lightmap resolutions
- Tweaked intensity of colors (Canyons too red, flora too green)
- Cybershoes support

Fixes
- Fixed level 04_Caves white background glitch
- Color correction

Features/Improvements (Quest 2 specific)
- HD Zombies
- Zombies fall in ragdoll on death
- More mutilation variants on zombies
- Muzzle flash dynamic light
- Background zombies
- Destructable car windows
- Shader improvements
	- Added Normal/Specular
	- Extra zombie variations
	- Environment details
- More level decorations
	- Blood spots
	- Grass/Bushes/tall grass
	- Environmental particles
	- Birds

Features/Improvements (Quest 1 and 2) 
- Improved texture resolutions
- Improved lightmap resolutions
- Tweaked intensity of colors (Canyons too red, flora too green)
- Cybershoes support

Fixes
- Fixed level 04_Caves white background glitch

New:
- Oculus group launch support
- Added tutorial option
- Added Circle tooltip option
- Added hand offset option
- Added separate voice language option
- Added 180 flip enabled option

Improvements:
- Changed lightmap texture compression for all levels, making it less blocky
- Improved some areas in the campaign to bring them on the same quality as the rest
- Changed texture filtering from bilinear to trilinear, reducing seams

Bug fixes:
- Fixed tracer appearing to go backwards when shooting something close to the barrel origin
- Fixed dead players body blocking zombies
- Fixed pistol not correctly appearing to be empty
- Fixed an issue that you couldn't switch the console gun with cartridges
- Fixed damned cartridge not being reset properly in the menu
- Fixed 'One-Man Militia' and 'Online' Deadman DLC achievements
- Fixed a lighting bug that most of the time the specular reflections were not properly rendered

New Campaign DLC added "The Damned".
Added One-handed weapon only "Classic" Horde Mode, includes single-hand versions of Spectre, MP4 and Super Shorty.
Seperate leaderboards for Classic Horde Mode.

- An all-new campaign mission taking place before the events of Arizona Sunshine
- Online co-op functionality for up to two players
- A range of difficulty degrees including the insane Apocalyptic Mode!
- Six new achievements spread across an infested missile silo
- Three new weapons: A fully automatic submachine gun, a two-handed shotgun and a tactical handgun

New Features:
- Introducing the 'Undead valley' hordemode map
- Added functionality to drop weapons by holding a 'eject ammo' (A/B/X/Y) button

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed B/Y buttons now properly eject ammo again
- Tweaked anti-cheat colliders above crates in horde mode

The update includes the following changes to Arizona Sunshine Quest:
- Introducing the 'Old mine' horde mode map
- Notifications are a bit bigger so they are easier to read
- Fixed crash that sometimes happens in multiplayer games
- Fixed an error when starting multiplayer games
- Fixed clip size of the M2 Carbine gun

- Two handed weapon mode
	- Campaign with two handed guns
	- Horde mode now has both one-handed and two-handed guns available
- Tweaked/Improved interactions quality (Interacting with cars/doors/ammo/reloading no longer causes the screen to go black)
- Fixed bug that sometimes the winch is not present in the level 'Bridge'
- Fixed achievement 'Quack quack %$#@!'
- Fixed an issue where players could sit inside the geometry in the horde mode level
- Fixed an issue where players would get stuck when they teleport down the ladder at the radio in the level 'Trailerpark”

- Implemented Rich Presence
- Minor changes to gun raytracing
